questions.title: Existential Business Risks
questions.prompt: What keeps you up at night? What are the biggest risks to this business that are outside of your control?
followups: If this startup fails, what will be the most likely cause?
What risk are you most worried about that you haven't mitigated yet?
What keeps you up at night that you *can* control?

questions.title: The Peter Thiel Question
questions.prompt: Tell me something that is true that almost nobody agrees with you on.
followups: Why do you believe this?
If you are wrong, what does that mean for your business?
What evidence would change your mind?

questions.title: Path to $100k MRR
questions.prompt: Walk me through the exact steps you will take to get to $100k in Monthly Recurring Revenue (MRR).
followups: How many customers is that?
What has to happen in your sales/marketing funnel to achieve that?
How long will it take you?

questions.title: Weakest Link
questions.prompt: What part of your plan are you least confident about?
followups: Why haven't you solved that part yet?
What experiment are you running to de-risk that area?
What help do you need to fix this weakness?

questions.title: The No YC Scenario
questions.prompt: What are you going to do if we don't fund you?
followups: Does this company exist without YC?
How will you fundraise otherwise?
Are you building this company regardless of external validation?

questions.title: Advanced Unit Economics
questions.prompt: Your LTV/CAC ratio is 3:1. How does this change if interest rates rise and venture capital becomes scarce?
followups: Can you be a cash-flow positive business?
What is your path to profitability?
How long can you survive with zero additional funding?

questions.title: The Monopoly Question
questions.prompt: What is your defensibility? In 5 years, why haven't you been crushed by a larger competitor?
followups: Is brand the only defensibility in consumer software?
Do you have network effects?
Is it really a network effect or just viral growth?

questions.title: Deep Dive: Retention Breakdown
questions.prompt: You told me your retention is X%. Walk me through the retention curve for your best cohort versus your worst cohort. What explains the delta?
followups: What did you do differently to acquire the best cohort?
Why did the worst cohort churn?
What specific feature do retained users use that churned users never touched?

questions.title: Founder Market Fit (Deep)
questions.prompt: Why are you personally obsessed with this problem?
followups: Did you experience this pain yourself?
What is the origin story of this company?
Why not give up and work on something easier?

questions.title: Term Sheet Knowledge
questions.prompt: We offer you $125k for 7%. Is that fair? How do you know?
followups: What is the standard deal YC offers? (Standard deal: $125k for 7% or $500k for 10% with Deal Flow) [Citation needed from interviewer knowledge]
How much dilution are you willing to accept before Demo Day?
What is your post-money valuation expectation?

questions.title: The Low Point Scenario
questions.prompt: Every successful startup has a near-death experience. Describe what yours has been (or realistically will be).
followups: How did you keep the team together?
What did you learn about yourself in that moment?
What would you have done if you couldn't raise money?

questions.title: Feedback on YC
questions.prompt: What questions do you have for us?
followups: What do you wish you had known as a founder?
How do you measure success of a partner?
What makes the difference between a good batch and a great batch?
